channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 南非储备银行行长表示在通货膨胀得到控制之前不会降息
item.description:

item.title: 在埃及政府与阿联酋达成巨额开发协议后，埃及希望其地中海沿岸每年能吸引数百万外国游客。
item.description:
Egypt hopes its Mediterranean coast can attract millions of foreign tourists each year after the government agreed a huge development deal with the UAE https://t.co/dj9TCfnK9D

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 比特币周四向64000美元回升，增强了人们对这一全球最大加密货币可能很快创下历史新高的信心。不过，在此之前，交易者可能要休息一下了。
item.description:
Bitcoin ticked its way back up toward $64,000 on Thursday, shoring up confidence that the world’s largest cryptocurrency might soon reach a record high. Before that, though, traders could be in for a break. https://t.co/CdJA3zVkx7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省正在禁止在某些类型的农业用地和风景区开展可再生能源项目，因为该省保守派政府正在反击总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）的清洁能源目标。
item.description:
Alberta is barring renewable-energy projects on certain types of agricultural lands and scenic areas as the province’s conservative government pushes back against Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s clean-energy goals https://t.co/8CWxQPMevM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷行业中，基金经理往往比其他人更看重他们的贷款。监管机构开始担心
item.description:
Fund managers in the $1.7 trillion private credit industry often value their loans more generously than others do. Regulators are starting to worry https://t.co/8fWKrD2PbP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统的政府将向公共交通机构提供 98 亿美元的联邦资金，这是他在寻求连任之际为强调美国基础设施投资所做的最新努力。
item.description:
President Joe Biden's administration will provide $9.8 billion in federal funds to public transit agencies, the latest effort to highlight investments in US infrastructure as he seeks reelection https://t.co/Ow7rHwTXY6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 米莱政府的一位高级官员称，阿根廷正在与国际货币基金组织谈判一项新计划，以寻求新的现金来加快摆脱资本管制。
item.description:
A senior Milei government official says Argentina is negotiating a new program with the International Monetary Fund, seeking fresh cash to speed up its exit from capital controls https://t.co/6JhEkruVSJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在石油出口强劲的帮助下，加拿大经济在去年年底出现反弹，而劳工停工后的反弹又促进了 2024 年初的增长。
item.description:
The Canadian economy bounced back at the end of last year with the help of strong oil exports, while a rebound after labor stoppages boosted growth in early 2024. https://t.co/7xbe2boCcT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国制裁正逐渐加剧俄罗斯石油出口的热度，甚至可能很快就会中断石油出口
item.description:
US sanctions are slowly turning up the heat on Russian oil exports, to the point where they may soon be disrupted https://t.co/HbYDTZCwDx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美联储首选的基本通胀指标在 1 月份以近一年以来最快的速度上升，支持了政策制定者开始降息的耐心态度。
item.description:
The Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge of underlying inflation rose in January at the fastest pace in nearly a year, supporting policymakers’ patient approach to start cutting interest rates. https://t.co/8u4FKuXU7l

item.title: 在尼日利亚央行行长表示该国正在损失来自未注册加密货币交易所的税收之后几天，尼日利亚当局拘留了两名 Binance 的高管。
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）正在权衡延长英国对石油和天然气公司利润征收暴利税的提议，以便在下周的预算中为个人减税提供资金支持。
item.description:
Chancellor Jeremy Hunt is weighing proposals to extend the UK’s windfall tax on the profits of oil and gas companies to help finance personal tax cuts at his budget next week https://t.co/NNJtDQTVDO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团正寻求通过私募海外债券筹集约 4 亿美元资金
item.description:
Indian billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate is looking to raise roughly $400 million through the private placement of overseas bonds, sources say https://t.co/pKtMRdWXVR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 加沙城及其周边地区的医院报告说，在试图运送人道主义援助物资的餐车周围一片混乱，数十名平民伤亡被送入医院
item.description:
Hospitals in and around Gaza City report scores of dead and wounded civilians have been brought in from a chaotic scene around food trucks trying to deliver humanitarian aid https://t.co/VWNnkcd4DO

item.title: 一场针对物流集团 Wincanton 的竞购战已经爆发。这是又一个廉价、不受重视的英国公司被外部买家抢购的例子，而且没有理由期待这种趋势会很快结束。
item.description:
A bidding war has broken out over logistics group Wincanton. It's yet another example of a cheap, under-appreciated UK company being snapped up by external buyers - and there's no reason to expect the trend to end soon. https://t.co/JVmKnqphdp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 非洲三分之一的国家将在 2024 年选举政府。谁将在南非、塞内加尔和加纳掌权？请在 #ThePoliticsSpace⤵️🎙️@RosMathieson🎙️@mikecohen21🎙️@YIbukun🎙️@katarinah🎙️@colleengoko 中加入我们的对话。
item.description:
A third of Africa's countries will elect their governments in 2024. Who will take power in South Africa, Senegal, and Ghana?

Join our conversation in #ThePoliticsSpace⤵️

item.title: 印度和毛里求斯为阿加莱加群岛上的新简易机场和码头举行落成典礼，从而加强了该地区的军事基础设施，因为该地区的海盗企图和中国军舰入侵事件日益增多
item.description:

item.title: @JLeeEnergy 写道：虽然伦敦国际能源周的分析师们认为石油市场趋紧，但欧佩克+不太可能认为石油市场已经紧张到需要采取行动的地步。

item.title: 全球最大的加密货币交易所 Binance 表示，已为过去两年中存款处理不当的用户追回了价值 44 亿美元的数字资产
item.description:
